member.name: T:Engine.FileSystem.VirtualDirectory
member.summary: Defines a directory for virtual file system.

member.name: M:Engine.FileSystem.VirtualDirectory.Exists(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether the given path refers to an existing directory on virtual file system.
member.returns: true if the directory is exists; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Engine.FileSystem.VirtualDirectory.GetFiles(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the names of files in the specified directory.
member.param: The directory from which to retrieve the files.
member.returns: A String array of file names in the specified directory.

member.name: M:Engine.FileSystem.VirtualDirectory.GetFiles(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the names of files in the specified directory that match the specified search pattern.
member.param: The directory from which to retrieve the files.

The search string to match against the names of files in path. The parameter cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar or System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar, nor can it contain any of the characters in System.IO.Path.InvalidPathChars.
member.returns: A String array containing the names of files in the specified directory that match the specified search pattern.

member.name: M:Engine.FileSystem.VirtualDirectory.GetFiles(System.String,System.String,System.IO.SearchOption)
member.summary: Returns the names of files in the specified directory that match the specified search pattern, using a value to determine whether to search subdirectories.
member.param: The directory from which to retrieve the files.

The search string to match against the names of files in path. The parameter cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar or System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar, nor can it contain any of the characters in System.IO.Path.InvalidPathChars.
One of the System.IO.SearchOption values that specifies whether the search operation should include all subdirectories or only the current directory.
member.returns: A String array containing containing the names of files in the specified directory that match the specified search pattern.

member.name: M:Engine.FileSystem.VirtualDirectory.GetDirectories(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the names of subdirectories in the specified directory.
member.param: The path for which an array of subdirectory names is returned.
member.returns: An array of type String containing the names of subdirectories in path.

member.name: M:Engine.FileSystem.VirtualDirectory.GetDirectories(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets an array of directories matching the specified search pattern from the current directory.
member.param: The search string to match against the names of files in path. The parameter cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by DirectorySeparatorChar or AltDirectorySeparatorChar, nor can it contain any of the characters in InvalidPathChars.
member.returns: A String array of directories matching the search pattern.

member.name: M:Engine.FileSystem.VirtualDirectory.GetDirectories(System.String,System.String,System.IO.SearchOption)
member.summary: Gets an array of directories matching the specified search pattern from the current directory, using a value to determine whether to search subdirectories.
member.param: The search string to match against the names of files in path. The parameter cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by DirectorySeparatorChar or AltDirectorySeparatorChar, nor can it contain any of the characters in InvalidPathChars.
One of the SearchOption values that specifies whether the search operation should include all subdirectories or only the current directory.
member.returns: A String array of directories matching the search pattern.
